vulnerabilities.evidence: Missing Object.freeze, strict mode, or function protection
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement JavaScript protection mechanisms against tampering

vulnerabilities.description: No developer tools detection or protection
vulnerabilities.remediation: Consider implementing developer tools detection for sensitive applications

recommendations: Implement Content Security Policy with strict 'unsafe-eval' restrictions
Remove sensitive data from client-side code
Minimize API endpoint exposure in frontend code
Remove debug code from production builds
